sentences.english: I read this book for a biography book report.
sentences.chinese: 爲了撰寫一份傳記類書評，我閱讀了此書。

sentences.english: More than three quarters of the information on the internet is in English too!
sentences.chinese: 世界書刊雜誌的四分之三都是用英文撰寫的。

sentences.english: Students and experts continue to study and write about her work.
sentences.chinese: 學生們和專家們繼續學習和撰寫她的作品。

sentences.english: That’s the best thing any new blogger can do.
sentences.chinese: 這樣非常好，任何新的博客撰寫者都能做到。

sentences.english: She also writes for The Times and the magazine Psychologies .
sentences.chinese: 她也爲《泰晤士報》和《心理學》雜誌撰寫文章。

sentences.english: My father was writing a composition in the study room.
sentences.chinese: 我的父親正在撰寫一本組成的自修室。

sentences.english: She has also written dozens of articles and coauthored three textbooks.
sentences.chinese: 她還撰寫了數十篇文章並與人合著了三部教科書。

sentences.english: "Think of the Bible the way you would a stratified archaeological site, " he says.
sentences.chinese: “聖經的撰寫過程便如同分層的考古遺址，”他說。

sentences.english: He was an early adopter of blogging, and he takes it very seriously.
sentences.chinese: 他很早就開始撰寫博客，而且對此事的態度極爲嚴肅。

sentences.english: I am writing this in Xi’an, ancient capital of the Chinese empire.
sentences.chinese: 我正在中國古都西安撰寫此文。

sentences.english: It's important to know that a key aspect of screenwriting is to rewrite.
sentences.chinese: 記住，劇本撰寫的竅門之一就是不斷地重寫。

sentences.english: Important books of the Old Testament were written or assembled at roughly the same time.
sentences.chinese: 聖經舊約的重要篇章也大概在這個時期撰寫或者編纂。

sentences.english: They will write stories about your victories for thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 人們將會爲你的勝利撰寫傳奇，流傳千古。

sentences.english: The standarding of sci-tech journals needs write abstract of treatise in right way.
sentences.chinese: 正確撰寫論文摘要是科技期刊標準化的要求。

sentences.english: Derik and Kyle have produced 19 episodes at the time of this writing.
sentences.chinese: 在撰寫本文的時候，二人已經制作了19個短片。

sentences.english: Ms. Lewis says people with disabilities helped write the new report.
sentences.chinese: 劉易斯女士表示，殘疾人士幫忙撰寫了這份新報告。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to talk about/to narrate/to give an account
to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
